scripts.hakatashi: cd web && pug -O hakatashi.js -p beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade -P < beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade > hakatashi.html
scripts.napier: cd web && pug -O napier.js -p beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade -P < beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade > napier.html
scripts.columns: cd web && pug -O columns.js -p beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade -P < beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade > columns.html
scripts.bib: cd web && pug -O bib.js -p beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade -P < beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade > bib.html
scripts.index: cd web && pug -O index.js -p beautiful-hexo/layout/index.jade -P < beautiful-hexo/layout/index.jade > index.html
scripts.build: npm run index && npm run hakatashi && npm run napier && npm run columns && npm run bib
